q: The singer is close friends with show supremo Simon Cowell and would be prepared to accept a judging or mentoring role on the new series when it launches later this year. He told the Daily Mail newspaper: Simon Cowell and I have talked about doing things together and I always try to be supportive of people who are friends of mine. Simon Cowell - who is set to announce the highly anticipated final judging line-up for the show within the next month- has previously said he is looking for an American superstar to join the panel and conceded Usher

I think this might be just what the show needs-- a fresh start, says Kimberley Locke ." Not to mention some of the pressure is off the contestants. They don't have to stress over what Simon Cowell will or won't say. That's kind of cool."

He said the electorate was expecting that focus when Barack Obama assumed office. I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment, which I think is the major problem facing American right now, and I think, and I hope, this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley ." Within minutes of his decision being made public, the Washington-based Planned Parenthood Action Fund put out a statement criticizing the staunchly anti-abortion Mike Pence . As women voters in Indiana learn that one of Rep. Mike Pence 's top legislative priorities is effectively denying access to preventive care for millions of women, he will have difficulty winning their vote, Cecile Richards , the fund's president, said in a statement. But among conservatives, the only disappointment was that Mike Pence wasn't aiming at the White House rather than the Statehouse.

23 minutes ago By DEE-ANN DURBIN, AP Auto Writer Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made." We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile." Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products

The Internet search leader also said that the company's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will focus on" special projects." Investors rejoiced, sending shares up 2 percent in after hours trading.

I am absolutely positive- and I am not an advocate for the News of the World- that this wasn't a practice for one newspaper or even one newspaper group," Mr Lewis said. It's fair to say that over the past 10 years or so most entertainment stories will have had some element of subterfuge.
